generated_body: The article likely discusses the recent incident involving Mason Rudolph, who was struck in the head with his own helmet during a game. Readers may expect an analysis of the situation, including opinions on the extent of blame assigned to Rudolph for the play and its potential consequences for his career. It could also explore differing viewpoints from sports analysts and fans regarding player safety and responsibility in high-contact sports. The piece may provide context about the game and insights into the reactions from the broader football community.
